question: How to use Mitsubishi FX-series PLC IL instruction list and the DECO instruction to control a bidirectional red-yellow-green light cycle? Assume input X000, outputs Y000~Y005, and use M1~M16, M100, M101, T1~T6, and D1 to implement phase switching.

OUT Y001                   ; East-West yellow light ON
OUT T2 K40                 ; Yellow light lasts 4.0 seconds (T2)
AND T2                     ; When T2 times out
MOV K3 D1                  ; Switch to next state (East-West red)

// State 3: East-West red light phase

OUT M100                   ; Both East-West and North-South red light control
OUT T3 K2                 ; Red light lasts 264 seconds (T3)
AND T3                     ; When T3 times out
MOV K4 D1                  ; Switch to next state (North-South green)
